video_prompt: Liquid waves flow and merge behind a central vase, illuminated by dynamic light and glowing elements. Flowers subtly shift within the vase, while ripples spread on the reflective surface below. Star-like specks pulse, and colors pour downwards, transforming the background.
image_prompt: Cosmic fusion of nature and mystery: A clear glass vase with glowing pink roses and submerged orange/pink flowers, centered on a rippling dark blue liquid surface. Dark, star-speckled background with glowing four-pointed stars. Vibrant, swirling blue, pink, and gold cosmic waves pour down from above, merging into the liquid around the vase. Soft, celestial ambiance.
refined_video_prompt: Dynamic light continuously washes over the scene, causing glowing elements to pulse and shift. Liquid waves flow, merge, and endlessly transform the background. Flowers subtly sway and adjust their positions. Ripples actively spread outwards on the reflective surface. Star-like specks spontaneously pulse and fade, as vibrant colors pour downwards, creating an ever-changing backdrop.
